item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, December 16, 2024 at 3:05 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Assad dispatched $250mn of Syria’s cash to Moscow
2. Big Chinese naval exercise leaves Taiwan and US struggling for response
3. London Stock Exchange suffers biggest exodus since financial crisis
4. Sam Altman reckons with a growing threat to OpenAI: Elon Musk
5. Peter Hargreaves’ Blue Whale sells major tech stocks over AI concerns
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, December 16, 2024 at 3:05 AM UTC
